beer.name: Maierfest Lager
beer.description: Maierfest is dark gold in color with a solid off-white foam stand. It has a rich German malt aroma and a very distinct and complex maltness with a dry finish.
beer.grains: Durst Pilsner, Durst Munich and Weyermann Acidulated
Durst Pilsner, Durst Munich and Weyermann Acidulated
